text: Scotiabank Arena is a multi-purpose arena in Toronto. It is the home of the Toronto Maple Leafs of the National Hockey League (NHL), as well as the Toronto Raptors of the National Basketball Association (NBA). ==References== Category:1999 establishments in Canada Category:Indoor arenas Category:Music venues Category:Sports buildings in Canada Category:Sport in Toronto Category:Toronto Raptors Category:Buildings and structures in Toronto Category:Toronto Maple Leafs
title: Scotiabank Arena
